item.title: Water for Pakistan: Lifeline, Dependency, and the Shifting Control
item.description: Water is not just a natural resource for Pakistan—it is its lifeline. item.title: What is the most expensive spice in the world when listed by weight?
item.description: The most expensive spice in the world, when listed by weight, is saffron. Saffron is derived from the stigma (the female reproductive part) of the Crocus sativus flower. It is renowned for its distinct flavor, aroma and vibrant color, which adds depth and complexity to dishes.
